## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [lookAt(target, worldUp)](./decentraland-ecs.transform.lookat.md) |  | Rotates the transform so the forward vector points at target's current position. |
|  [rotate(axis, angle)](./decentraland-ecs.transform.rotate.md) |  | Applies a rotation of euler angles around the x, y and z axis. |
|  [translate(vec)](./decentraland-ecs.transform.translate.md) |  | Moves the transform in the direction and distance of translation. |
